places_with_reviews.name: Regenta Central City Vilas Palace
address: 9th Milestone LHS, Ambala - Chandigarh Expy, Kakru, Ambala, Haryana 134007, India

reviews.text: 🚂🚂🚂                                                      I had not gone inside I just took coffee from barista drive throw counter outside it washroom are very neat clean, food and some outlets are inside the building while some fast food outlets are outside the building it's on main road on its ENTRY GATE they have kept a REAL TRAIN 🚂 ENGINE not working just for attraction and photographs.                   🚂 🚂 🚂  The front of building 🏫 has a look of ancient palace

It is a newly built Hotel in Ambala City. Situated on a highway, earlier was composed of only Haveli which now has made this part of hotel as well.
The hotel is good, quite spacious. Has 3 boardrooms, 1 bar, 1 all day dining place and a roof swimming pool which gives good vibes as one can see the roads from there and in the morning, the sunrise is a great view to watch.
The rooms are spacious and the services are also great.
The staff is courteous and polite. Behave professionally.
The food is also delicious.
It has the potential to become one of the best hotels in Ambala if it continues to maintain the services and enhances a bit of everything at the hotel.
It is situated just 3 km from Jaggi City Centre, towards Chandigarh

We had an family event there last month.. dewan-e- khas hall and lawn area combined is small for 150 pacs good for 100 pacs .... bit pricey.. some elements were missing which were decided at the time of booking and breifing so keep a check on it until the last moment.. food items were too missing at the time of serve which were there on the docket we signed... overall was a mix experience .. not smooth .. at managerial level there's a lot of confusion and fuss there which will bitter your experience.... overall it was good. can't say its awesome or even best.,, .. this was my nd my family experience .... thanks..

Was invited for a party on Friday last at their restaurant pinxx. Service was real poor, the whole place had only we 12 guests and their was just one waiteress to manage. We were told the staff isbusy in other parties. What a poor excuse. If you cannot arrange staff why not close the restaurant. Snacks reached cold and in between for full 20 minutes there was break in service of the snacks. Host was running around himself to get the things in order. Host told me that inspite of placing order boforehand for the party , this was situation.
The property is at the highway. It has spacious and clean rooms. The food here is amazing. It is a great place for a stopover for onward journey.

places_with_reviews.name: Palmdale Resort Ambala Lawns & Banquets
address: NH-65, Ambala - Hissar Rd, Village Durkhara, Ambala, Haryana 134003, India

reviews.text: I am the owner of Devbhumi Hills Tour and Travels or a professional driver by profession, often I have seen that driver rooms are available in hotels or resorts. Thanks for this, but they are still dirty and smelly, no attention is paid to cleanliness. That's why we mostly sleep in our car, no matter how cold it is, but this time when I saw this insanity, I was not afraid to even look into my eyes. This resort made my sleeping arrangements very well and clean and I was able to spend my night well that too in such cold weather. The gentleman at the reception spoke very nicely and I noticed that no matter who the staff was, he spoke very nicely to his guests, leaving no stone unturned in meeting their needs. The location is very nice which is on the main road or it is the perfect location for parties, weddings, or other meetings gathering, special attention has been taken to cleanliness here. The food was also good and healthy...anyone can spend their time well here as it is a very peaceful place.

I would definitely recommend this place for remote stay, destination wedding or any other occasions where you want a best experience for. Good thing is that this is bit away from the city and as a result this place is quite peaceful. Rooms are awesome and the service is also awesome.
This place is even good for staycation.

Beautiful property with wonderful services by the entire staff. Special thanks to Mr. Rajesh Yadav who managed to get all things in shape. It is a must visit if you visit Ambala city. Food quality is super amazing all thanks to the skilled chef. Overall it was a great stay experience.

Very beautiful ❤️ and very big resort and marriage place.Palmdale Resort is a popular destination for tourists and travelers looking for a relaxing and luxurious stay. The resort offers a range of amenities, including swimming pools, spa services, The rooms and suites are spacious and well-appointed, providing a comfortable stay for guests. The resort's location in a scenic area adds to its charm and appeal. Overall, Palmdale Resort appears to be a great choice for those seeking a luxurious and peaceful getaway.
One of the best venues for different gathering sizes with options of multiple Halls and lawn. Nice aroma of the place. Suits fit for destination wedding and catchy location.

places_with_reviews.name: Hotel Golden Orchid
address: Kalka chownk, New Vita Enclave Rd, near vita milk plant, New Pratap Nagar, Ambala, Haryana 134003, India

reviews.text:
It was a good stay at the hotel. Rooms are spacious.

Bed and linens were clean.
Staff is really good and helpful. They were open to negotiations since we arrived here quite late in the night.

They have good parking space available.
Driver stay facility is also available.

Biggest con -
Bathrooms are dirty and smelly. Shower was not working properly.

Overall a decent stay.

We booked this property for my sister’s wedding. All the functions and events were arranged here, we got the best service and arrangements here. Rooms were clean and with good lights, food quality and quantity bestest. All our guests and friends praised the food quality. All the hotel staff and members were available on one call and delivered what we expected.
Overall experience very very good.
HIGHLY RECOMMENDED ❤️❤️
Thank You Lukesh 👍🏻

The staff at this property are all great! They all go above and beyond to make your stay comfortable.
Hotel Manager Mr. Ajay Pathania is a nice person and makes it an easy stay by allowing early check-ins if the rooms are available and also assists with taxi bookings.
Over all a good package.

I recently had the pleasure of staying at Hotel Golden Orchird in Ambala with my family, and I must say it exceeded my expectations in every way possible.

The room we stayed in was spacious, providing ample space for my family to move around comfortably. The large windows in the room allowed plenty of natural light to filter in, creating a warm and inviting atmosphere.

What truly impressed me was the exceptional customer service we received. Despite booking a super deluxe room, we were pleasantly surprised to be upgraded to an executive room at no extra cost. This unexpected gesture not only enhanced our experience but also showcased the hotel's commitment to ensuring guest satisfaction.

From the well-appointed rooms to the attentive staff, our stay at Hotel Golden Orchird was nothing short of delightful. I highly recommend this hotel to anyone visiting Ambala and looking for a comfortable and memorable stay
We held our whole wedding functions here, It was very great experience overall. Excellent service and delicious food. Highly recommended , also the owner lokesh is very kind and co operative.

places_with_reviews.name: Sangeet Resorts
address: 65, Kaithal - Ambala Road Hissar, Kaithal - Ambala Rd, Ambala, Haryana 134003, India

reviews.text:
Sangeet Resort, located near Hissar Road in Ambala, offers a serene and comfortable retreat for travelers seeking relaxation and tranquility. Nestled amidst lush greenery, the resort provides a picturesque setting for guests to unwind and rejuvenate.

The resort boasts well-appointed rooms equipped with modern amenities to ensure a comfortable stay for visitors. Whether it's a family vacation, a romantic getaway, or a business trip, Sangeet Resort caters to various accommodation needs with its range of room options.

In addition to comfortable lodging, the resort offers an array of facilities and services to enhance guests' experience. From a swimming pool and fitness center for recreational activities to banquet halls and conference rooms for events and meetings, Sangeet Resort caters to diverse requirements.

The on-site restaurant serves delicious meals, including local delicacies and international cuisines, prepared by skilled chefs. Guests can indulge in culinary delights while enjoying the serene ambiance of the resort.

Moreover, the courteous staff members ensure attentive service and strive to make guests feel welcomed throughout their stay. With its tranquil ambiance, modern amenities, and attentive hospitality, Sangeet Resort in Ambala near Hissar Road promises a memorable and enjoyable experience for discerning travelers.

Big and spacious resort. Food quality is good.
Decoration was too good

It's one of the best wedding place in Ambala. Have a huge laws and halls. Hospitality and Catering that they provide is one of the best. The organizers here follow latest trends in Wedding Decor. Not too far from City's center so approachable. It have ample parking space. They also take care of last minute needs and asks of clients. One must consider them if planning a wedding or any such occasion.
Excellent place good food and courteous staff.
Loved the place the vibe and decoration and food everything was top class👍🏻

reviews.text: Bad experience. Management has changed. New management pathetic. You call them for room. They say available. When u reach hotel, they say room is not available. No geyser is some rooms. They will provide hot water balti on demand..

Ambience - 8/10

Service - 7/10 extremely fast

Hospitality - 2/10

Genuine review
I have been to this place at least 10 times over the past year.
The food is great, the ambience is great but the rating is because of the hospitality we expected in this sector. We asked for normal drinking water instead of bottled water. They said they do not serve bottled water at this place which is against govt norms and also unbecoming of a restaurant.

Very bad experience

GM Brijesh Updhay is a very non sense person.

No manners to talk with customers

Very rustic behavior by Brijesh Updhay
The room is very clean, the food is absolutely delicious, I really enjoyed my stay.
Excellent service. Well mannered staff. Good food.

places_with_reviews.name: Hotel Clarks Inn
address: Jaggi city centre, Jammu - Delhi Rd, 9Q9X+6W7, Model Town Rd, Sena Nagar, Dholkot, Crossing, Ambala Cantt, Haryana 133001, India

reviews.text:
My family and I found ourselves in an incredibly tough spot one night due to dense fog, zero visibility, and extreme cold. Desperate for shelter and safety, we approached this hotel, hoping for a warm room to protect our kids and ourselves.

However, despite the late hour and the emergency situation, we were turned away because of their policy against allowing a couple with two kids to share a room. It was heartbreaking and frustrating to be denied accommodation when we needed it the most.

We understand policies exist for reasons, but in moments of crisis and urgency, we expected a bit of compassion and understanding. We were left outside, shivering in the bitter cold, feeling utterly abandoned by an establishment that valued rules over human well-being.

I urge this hotel to reconsider its policies or at least have some flexibility for emergencies. No family should ever be denied a room when seeking refuge in such dire conditions. This experience was not just disappointing but also deeply upsetting.

Service and Location was good. I went there to attend a function in the Hall, so I can't review the Rooms. 4 stars are being given because I didn't really like the Food Quality, it might be because of the Menu chosen by the host. But it is not expected from the Clarks. Hopefully, I will update my review if I get better food on my next visit.

Rooms are adequate, location is good but beware that if you are unlucky enough to get a room on the second floor that you will be under the party hall which the hotel staff claim is not part of theirs or under their control despite being in the same building so you are at the mercy of the partygoers and when they will turn their music off so you and your family can actually try to get some sleep

I must say it is one of the best hotel of the city of Ambala which lies in the state of Haryana. The clock in how to live mostly all the basic abilities and facilities for their customers. Food is quite good and I miss is quite peaceful and comfortable with cosy furniture out there.

Location is the only advantage for this hotel otherwise all otherwise services are very poor, staff is not supportive, very high tariff with no special services,

I suggest not to visit there
